mapper.update: where customer_id = #{customer_id} and gm_yn = 'N' UPDATE CUSTOMER SET GM = #{gm}, GM_GRADE = #{gm_grade}, GM_YN = 'Y' WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND GM_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT ROUND((AVG(T.NB_U_TIME) / U.NB_U_TIME),2) AS NB_U_TIME, ROUND((AVG(T.COM_FEE_DLY_CNT) / U.COM_FEE_DLY_CNT),2) AS COM_FEE_DLY_CNT, ROUND((AVG(T.SNS_FRIEND_CNT) / U.SNS_FRIEND_CNT),2) AS SNS_FRIEND_CNT, ROUND((AVG(T.EMAIL_CHCK_RATIO) / U.EMAIL_CHCK_RATIO),2) AS EMAIL_CHCK_RATIO, ROUND((AVG(T.AVG_GRADE) / U.AVG_GRADE),2) AS AVG_GRADE, ROUND((AVG(T.M_SEARCH_CNT_AVG) / U.M_SEARCH_CNT_AVG),2) AS M_SEARCH_CNT_AVG, ROUND((AVG(T.SNS_UPLOAD_CNT) / U.SNS_UPLOAD_CNT),2) AS SNS_UPLOAD_CNT, ROUND((AVG(T.P_TEST_SCORE) / U.P_TEST_SCORE),2) AS P_TEST_SCORE FROM USER_BEHAVIOR T, USER_BEHAVIOR U WHERE U.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id}

SELECT T_CATEGORY AS CATEGORY, SUM(COST) AS TOTAL_COST FROM TRANSACTION_LIST WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND MONTH(TRANS_DATE) = MONTH(NOW()) GROUP BY T_CATEGORY ORDER BY SUM(COST) DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_TYPE) FROM TRANSACTION_LIST WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{customer_id} AND (PRODUCT_TYPE = '입금' OR PRODUCT_TYPE = '출금') AND MONTH(TRANS_DATE) = MONTH(NOW())
